title: PLS RIOT HELP
body:
I create an account and i cant use it
why?

replies.body:
Oh wow, that does sound like trouble. :(

If you're not able to logon to an account, some preliminary steps are to make 200% sure your login info is correct, and to also check that you're logging into the correct region as well.

If you're certain you're in the clear with both of those, try another login, and take a screen shot of what error message you get if any. Upload it online to your preference of website and link the image here for me to check! I'll take a look and see if I can recognize what's going on. :)
